North Korea's nuclear test has not been confirmed.

geological survey could not say whether it was an atomic explosion or a natural earthquake.

Welcome to the program.
Hi.
Nice to be with you.
Well, this was allegedly an underground test.
So how can nuclear monitors confirm it actually took place?
Well, South Korea has a seismic monitoring station close to the border with North Korea.

But it looks like it was a small nuclear test, small by nuclear standards, meaning about 1,000 tons of TNT equivalent.

has a sniffer plane in the area that can detect nuclear chemicals?

I think the Air Force will probably have a pretty good idea in the next 72 hours.
